availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Carmack (Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Martha Johnson Carmack. Father of L. Ella Carmack, Mary E. Carmack, Samuel J. Carmack, George W. Carmack, John T. Carmack, William E. Carmack, and Hugh K. Carmack. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860. Foreman of a jury in Campbell County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, p. 69.
Find A Grave, “George Washington Carmack (June 1812-April 4, 1895),” Memorial #135361989, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/135361989 (accessed June 5, 2017). KYR-0001-005-0074.
